price: Na tukawaokoa wale walio amini na walio kuwa wanamchamngu.
footnotes: Na Sisi tukakiokoa kikundi kilicho muamini Saleh kutokana na hilaki hii, na wakawa wanao gopa kuziacha amri zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
